verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: delivered] [ARG1: a stream - of - consciousness - style speech on immigration] [ARGM-TMP: as furor over his administration 's separation of families at the border reaches a fever pitch] .
